text: intent: implement UX improvements to kg web viewer (two rounds: hover previews + SSE + mobile + theme toggle)

outcome: shipped 10 features in src/kg/web.py: hover previews (/api/preview/<slug>), [[slug]] rendering in messages+session pages, font-size settings panel, session list preview text, agent page links, SSE streaming (/agent/<name>/events), live-dot, mobile @media breakpoint, light/dark mode (html.light), latest messages on top [kg-web]
pending: streaming thinking indicators (partial JSONL tail + SSE turn events) — largest remaining item from improve-web mission
